Procedure.csv:
In this task you will be required to identify what color the letters of the word presented are.

To do this you'll need to respond with the following keys:

Press {{key_1}} if the letters are {{color_1}} with your {{finger_1}} finger

Press {{key_2}} if the letters are {{color_2}} with your {{finger_2}} finger

Press {{key_3}} if the letters are {{color_3}} with your {{finger_3}} finger

Press {{key_4}} if the letters are {{color_4}} with your {{finger_4}} finger.

Please put your fingers in the correct places and get ready for some practice trials.
